channel.title: [317] Allstar Based Source! - Heavily Coded [317]
channel.description:
Hello! id like to welcome you guys to my server! We've been in the making for almost 3 months, constantly coding and updating server and making more stable... now we want you! Yes you to com witness a old school server trying to rise to the top! Help us do it. Be a part of our lovely comunity.
Forums link: Under Construction > Temp = [url=http://StrPkerscape.webs.com]StrPkerscape.webs.com[/url]
New home! (: theifing stalls are at home! [IMG]http://i1099.photobucket.com/albums/g382/marbic1/Picture1_zpsc6f01118.png[/img]
Rares Area!! [IMG]http://i1099.photobucket.com/albums/g382/marbic1/pictture2_zps6fde1a53.png[/img]
Barrows - Barrows now keeps track of kills. once you have 5 killed you can go get your prize! Chest is used to get spade [IMG]http://i1099.photobucket.com/albums/g382/marbic1/evolved0015_zps73ed97c4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1099.photobucket.com/albums/g382/marbic1/picture3_zps6bb80bbb.png[/img]
Dicing is fixed ^^^ can only dice in the area.
Fire making and more skills are being updated [IMG]http://i1099.photobucket.com/albums/g382/marbic1/evolved0012_zpsc131bc20.png[/img]
Skilling area! [IMG]http://i1099.photobucket.com/albums/g382/marbic1/LAlal_zpsfff1afde.png[/img]
The party room! [IMG]http://i1099.photobucket.com/albums/g382/marbic1/evolved0022_zps7d9ca3e4.png[/img]
Balloons falling!~ Pop the ballons to find the items put in the chest and pull the lever and BOOM [IMG]http://i1099.photobucket.com/albums/g382/marbic1/evolved0026_zpsccba0aa4.png[/img]
Animations to dagg will be added lmfao. [IMG]http://i1099.photobucket.com/albums/g382/marbic1/evolved0018_zps02a95392.png[/img]
Owner: Str Pker Web Developer: DevilXsummoner A.K.A Devil
Updates: We have made heart crystals with effects: -Lamps were added -Red heart crystal: makes you 5 seconds invinsible, depends where in server -Grey heart crystal: Repleshes your health -Crystal shield splits damage -A complete party room with fully working balloons and chests -All glitches dupes are fixed - including cheat clients -Full anti nuller -2 bosses are added - Bash & Daggnoth boss -Dicing zone - fully working dice area * Can only dice in the dice area -Barrows is now updated - Fully working and operational barrows * Have to kill all barrows brothers to access tunnel and get your prize -Rares area - 1-5% drop on items there -Lamp is added -Achievements have been added -Titles are in the process of the making -Server is stable - we make it stable everyday -Prayer glitch is fixed -Telegrab glitch is fixed -ALL connections from a cheat client are blocked -Range projectiles added -Maxhit command is more accuret -Player base is steady -Skills updated *Cut down trees for logs to firemake & fletch *Agility course is added -Bosses have full animations and special attacks -Server uptime is in quest tab. (: (No use for it just for fun lol.) ****NOTE*** More photos will be added
JOIN NOW!!
Client Download: http://uppit.com/ufxl7hn9hege/Str_Pker's_RSPS_Client_v2.rar
http://up.ht/QIp8bX

item.title: [317] Allstar Based Source! - Heavily Coded [317]
item.dc:creator: @Str_Pker_CODER Str Pker CODER
item.description:
@Str_Pker_CODER wrote:

Well i am truely sorry, ive been working on this for a while, and drops at rares i changed they are at a lower percent. We are currently fixing Vote4Cash and the stats board. Dont say this server sucks.

[quote=“imstrength, post:12, topic:474886”]sorry but this just looks terrible to me.

first off the skilling area has not been changed…and second nobody like the old style sources but thats just my opinion i suppose

side-note goodluck![/quote]

i can move skilling in an instant. but choose not to. This source and client will soon be released. And people will love it. doesnt matter if i havent changed anything, its more stable, a FULL anti nuller, and more fetures. a mini game just added. Everything. i will add pictures in a minute

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Allstar Based Source! - Heavily Coded [317]
item.dc:creator: @Str_Pker_CODER Str Pker CODER
item.description:
@Str_Pker_CODER wrote:

Hello! id like to welcome you guys to my server! We’ve been in the making for almost 3 months, constantly coding and updating server and making more stable… now we want you! Yes you to com witness a old school server trying to rise to the top! Help us do it. Be a part of our lovely comunity.

Forums link: Under Construction > Temp = StrPkerscape.webs.com

New home! (: theifing stalls are at home!

Rares Area!!

Barrows - Barrows now keeps track of kills. once you have 5 killed you can go get your prize! Chest is used to get spade

Dicing is fixed ^^^ can only dice in the area.

Fire making and more skills are being updated

Skilling area!

The party room!

Balloons falling!~ Pop the ballons to find the items put in the chest and pull the lever and BOOM

Animations to dagg will be added lmfao.

Owner:
Str Pker
Web Developer:
DevilXsummoner A.K.A Devil

Updates:
We have made heart crystals with effects:
-Lamps were added
-Red heart crystal: makes you 5 seconds invinsible, depends where in server
-Grey heart crystal: Repleshes your health
-Crystal shield splits damage
-A complete party room with fully working balloons and chests
-All glitches dupes are fixed - including cheat clients
-Full anti nuller
-2 bosses are added - Bash & Daggnoth boss
-Dicing zone - fully working dice area
* Can only dice in the dice area
-Barrows is now updated - Fully working and operational barrows
* Have to kill all barrows brothers to access tunnel and get your prize
-Rares area - 1-5% drop on items there
-Lamp is added
-Achievements have been added
-Titles are in the process of the making
-Server is stable - we make it stable everyday
-Prayer glitch is fixed
-Telegrab glitch is fixed
-ALL connections from a cheat client are blocked
-Range projectiles added
-Maxhit command is more accuret
-Player base is steady
-Skills updated
*Cut down trees for logs to firemake & fletch
*Agility course is added
-Bosses have full animations and special attacks
-Server uptime is in quest tab. (: (No use for it just for fun lol.)
*NOTE
More photos will be added

JOIN NOW!!

Client Download:
http://uppit.com/ufxl7hn9hege/Str_Pker’s_RSPS_Client_v2.rar

http://up.ht/QIp8bX
